data.name: VR Triber
data.detailed_description:
VR Triber is a VR online multiplayer social platform, where you can meet, communicate with and play with users from all over the world. You can also share your panorama with others to let them experience your world here.

There are many kinds of interactive props in this version, such as

  • Funny bow
  • Interactive brush
  • Remote-control aircraft
  • Virtual Instruments
  • Tiny scenery
  • Panoramic tour

And our VR social system provides the following services for you:

  • Voice communication
  • Photo sharing
  • Custom image
  • Custom Personal homepage

Besides, the version contains a demo shooting game which you can play with your friends.

So let's farewell to the human apathy in the smartphone era, and embrace your friends with both hands!

data.short_description: VR Triber is a VR online multiplayer social platform, where you can meet, communicate with and play with users from all over the world. You can also share your panorama with others to let them experience your world here.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • İşletim Sistemi: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10
  • İşlemci: CPU: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Bellek: 4 GB RAM
  • Ekran Kartı: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Ağ: Genişbant İnternet bağlantısı
  • Depolama: 1 GB kullanılabilir alan
pc_requirements.recommended:
Önerilen:
  • İşletim Sistemi: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10
  • İşlemci: CPU: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Bellek: 4 GB RAM
  • Ekran Kartı: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Ağ: Genişbant İnternet bağlantısı
  • Depolama: 1 GB kullanılabilir alan
